description.p: Luciferin is a generic term for the light-emitting compound found in organisms that generate bioluminescence like Fireflies and Glow Worms. Firefly Luciferin is a Java Fast Screen Capture PC software designed for Glow Worm Luciferin firmware, those two software create the perfect Bias Lighting and Ambient Light system for PC. Differently from other solutions, Firefly and Glow Worm Luciferin are designed to work together for the best experience possible.

ul.li: Best in class performance combined with ultra low CPU/GPU usage.
Advanced algorithms for smooth colors transitions and color correction. Seeing is believing.
Wireless or cabled, local or remote? Choose your flavour with MQTT support and Home Assistant integration.
Multi monitor support with single or multiple instances.
Surround lighting with satellites.
Web browser firmware installer and Web Interface.
Programmable firmware, change your microcontroller's settings on the fly.
Frequent updates, upgrade your PC software and your firmware in one click.
Automatic switching between aspect ratios based on your video content.
Made from a gamer, for gamers. No added lag, stutter free.
Multi platform, Windows and Linux ready. macOS is coming when it's ready.
If you don't want to design your own PCB and you have a soldering iron, there is Luciferin's official PCB.
Have a question? Get answered on the community.

Capture pipeline has been optimized for DX12 on Windows. Previously, under heavy GPU load, capture framerates would drop significantly, causing occasional LED stuttering. Now, the pipeline has been restructured to better utilize hardware resources, completely eliminating stuttering.
The Info menu now displays current CPU latency. Lower values indicate better performance. This value can be influenced by your screen resolution, capture area dimensions, and CPU/RAM overclocking.s
Home Assistant: Luciferin entities are now grouped under one devices.
Added a Tray icon and minimize to tray on Linux.
New non intrusive notification system on Linux.
Linux Wayland didn't ask you which screen to record when the recording permission expired. Fixed.
Firefly Luciferin now supports Flatpak and is now available on Flathub.
